thread.title: Samir Nasri flogs £6m Cheshire mansion with boasts eight bedrooms, its own nightclub and a cinema room
thread.title_full: Samir Nasri flogs £6m Cheshire mansion with boasts eight bedrooms, its own nightclub and a cinema room

author: rforrester
title: Samir Nasri flogs £6m Cheshire mansion with boasts eight bedrooms, its own nightclub and a cinema room
text:
lad's pad Samir Nasri flogs £6m Cheshire mansion with boasts eight bedrooms, its own nightclub and a cinema room 
Condo is set on 30 acres of private land which also has three stables and a track for horses By Richard Forrester 27th March 2017, 10:33 am Updated: 27th March 2017, 10:34 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SAMIR NASRI’S future in the Premier League looks bleaker than ever after his Cheshire mansion sold for a whopping £5.75million. 
The midfielder left Manchester City for Sevilla on loan last summer and it appears he has no plans to return after his house was finally sold. MEN Media Samir Nasri’s Cheshire mansion finally sold for a staggering £6million MEN Media 8 Inside included this intimate nightclub that has a dance floor and its own bar 
Placed on the market for a stunning £6m, the huge condo boasts EIGHT bedrooms on its 30 acre private plot. 
Keep up to date with ALL the latest Football news, gossip and rumours 
It opens up into a stunning marble entrance hall with a spiral staircase that takes you up to a luxurious cinema room and state of the art gym. 
But what sets this property apart from other footballer’s pads is Nasri had his own nightclub installed for when he hosted his gatherings. 
The intimate nightclub has its own dance floor and fully functioning bar – ideal to host party’s away from the eyes of the cameras. 
What’s more there is the chance to relax around the swimming pool or take a dip in the jacuzzi before heading to the steam room or sauna. MEN Media Guests can relax around the generous sized indoor swimming pool MEN Media Samir Nasri would have kept a selection of fine wines in the wine cellar MEN Media The property boasts eight luxurious bedrooms most read Not good enough Antonio Conte has sensationally rejected the chance to sign Neymar in a £155m deal from Barcelona leg-break horror Seamus Coleman set for surgery on potential career-threatening injury after his leg is snapped in half by Neil Taylor's wild tackle TV TIMES What TV channel is England vs Lithuania on, what time is kick-off and what is the latest team news? LIONHEART Brave Bradley Lowery gets the biggest cheer at Wembley as he leads out the England team with goal hero and best mate Jermain Defoe Seeing Red Keith Gillespie launches viscous elbow into face of opponent during Man United charity match 'We'll talk soon' Mesut Ozil gives clearest indication yet he is set to sign a new deal with Arsenal in the summer MEN Media Samir Nasri’s luxury house has plenty of places to relax including a cinema room MEN Media The property had been rented out whilst Samir Nasri played his football in Spain MEN Media A large playground sits on the 30 acre plot of land 
The house also includes a study, playroom and open plan kitchen. 
And it is just as impressive outside the house. 
The 30 acres of private land has three stables and a track for horse-lovers as well as a summer house and even a private waterfall. 
Children can enjoy the huge playground in the garden which includes a giant slide and basketball hoop. Samir Nasri has put his Cheshire mansion on the market - it has its own nightclub
